org.apache.cassandra.db

Class ColumnIndex

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.cassandra.db.ColumnIndex

  • public class ColumnIndex
extends java.lang.Object
    Column index builder used by BigTableWriter. For index entries that exceed Config.column_index_cache_size_in_kb, this uses the serialization logic as in RowIndexEntry.
